Thomas Wilson Boyde Jr bụ onye Afrịka Amerịka mbụ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na School of Architecture nke Mahadum Syracuse na onye Afrịka Amerịka nke mbụ na Rochester, New York.
Boyde bụ nwa nke atọ n'ime ụmụ anọ
A jụrụ ya ịbanye na West Point na 1923, ọ gara mahadum anọ n'ime afọ ise, gụsịrị akwụkwọ na 1928 na Baccalaureate na ihe owuwu site na School of Architecture nke Mahadum Syracuse
N'ime afọ ise sochirinụ, o nwere ndị were mmadụ n'ọrụ anọ, gụnyere ụlọ ọrụ New York State.

Mgbe onye na-ese ụkpụrụ ụlọ nke Rochester nke mechara kpọọ Monroe Community Hospital were Boyde n'ọrụ dị ka otu n'ime ndị na-enyere ya aka, ụdị ịchọ mma nke windo nkuku na mgbidi gbagọrọ agbagọ nwere ohere ịzụlite. Nke a dugara n'ọtụtụ ọrụ ndị ọzọ na, mgbe e mesịrị, ụlọ ọrụ ụlọ nke ya. Ndepụta ọrụ ya gụnyere ihe karịrị ebe azụmahịa iri atọ na ọnụ ọgụgụ ka ukwuu nke ihe onwunwe onwe onye. Ụdị nke abụọ kachasị ukwuu n'ime atụmatụ ya bụ ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ.

Akwụkwọ ya bụ akụkụ nke Rochester Museum na Science Center's collections. Akụkọ akụkọ TV nke 2020 kwuru na "Ihe kpọmkwem na-ahụ maka imepụta ka na-arụrịta ụka taa".  A mara ọkwa ọrụ $300,000 "iji kwado nyocha ọdịbendị nke ụlọ Thomas W
Ọ lụrụ nwunye mgbe ọ dị afọ iri abụọ na anọ
Ya na onye bụbu Jennie Jones nwere ụmụ atọ
Ka ọ na-aga n'ihu na ndụ ya, ọ rịara ọrịa multiple sclerosis ma nwụọ mgbe ọ dị afọ iri asaa na ise.
